title: Shira Shir-Organic Green Tea Matcha Lift Face Moisturizer- Helps Increase Skin Turnover For Hydrated, Nourished, And Rejuvenated Skin (50 ML)
features: MATCHA-MADE Matcha is one of the most powerful ingredients on the market. It is well-known for its wonderful skincare effects and widely used in all top-tier skincare products across the world. With matcha, your skin is always flawless.

NATURAL FACELIFT Thanks to the Shir-Organic Matcha Lift Moisturizer’s active ingredients, it has an incredibly powerful firming ability. This helps by giving your skin a youthful and vibrant look while also giving it a natural appearance.
COMPLETE COLLAGEN CARE Get your skin the rejuvenating collagen infusion it needs. Buy this matcha face moisturizer right now!
description: Matcha, the purest and most potent form of green tea, has been used for centuries to improve one’s health. Compared to green tea, in Matcha there is 137 times more EGCG, a powerful antioxidant, which helps to prevent and repair cell damage in the skin. Our unique formulation helps to lift and firm the skin by rapidly increasing cell turnover, and stimulating collagen to rejuvenate the skin.
